summary: High‑level status across Musai. This JSON is the single source of truth for the public roadmap until the DB is wired.

latestUpdates.title: MusaiChat: live reply streaming + logical/creative perspectives
latestUpdates.details: Chat replies now stream token-by-token. Final packets include structured POV with logical and creative reasoning, rendered as toggleable panels. Fully local-host friendly on macOS.

latestUpdates.title: MusaiChat and MusaiSearch beta is now working
latestUpdates.details: Core chat and intelligent discovery experiences are live in beta. Expect occasional rough edges while we stabilize long-running requests and polish UX.

latestUpdates.title: TaskMusai renamed to AgileMusai
latestUpdates.details: Routes, tabs, labels, and placeholders updated across the app.

latestUpdates.title: MedicalMusai: Doctor Modeling section
latestUpdates.details: Explains GP style‑mapping from voice notes, decisions, and portal messages; outputs SBAR‑style briefs.

latestUpdates.title: TherapyMusai: Symbolic Images + Partner Counseling visuals (WIP)
latestUpdates.details: Info page now lists image‑based tools for emotional externalization and couple dialogue.

latestUpdates.title: Landing: Roadmap tab + twin CTA
latestUpdates.details: Adds Roadmap alongside Explore; links to full roadmap page backed by this JSON.

latestUpdates.title: Ordering: TaskMusai placed last across lists
latestUpdates.details: Reflects that TaskMusai composes other Musai capabilities.

latestUpdates.title: MusaiCurations + MusaiStudio info pages added
latestUpdates.details: New marketing pages, routes, and nav surfaced on Landing.

latestUpdates.title: Explore carousel polishing
latestUpdates.details: Chromatic mapping stabilized; site map grouping refined.

items.label: Roadmap page + JSON source of truth
Roadmap: move to DB + lightweight admin
